data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Held On 29Th January 2026
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 and other applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of R M Drip and Sprinklers Systems Limited was held today i.e. Thursday 29th January 2026.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results
data.news_body: R M Drip And Sprinklers Systems Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31 December 2025 and to transact any other business as may be specified in the agenda

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Un-Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results
data.news_body:
The Board inter alia considered and approved the following:

1. Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

2. Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Cash Flow Statement for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

3. Limited Review Reports (Standalone and Consolidated) issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025 as required under Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of R M Drip and Sprinklers Systems Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 30 2025 the equity shares of R M Drip and Sprinklers Systems Ltd (Scrip Code: 544456) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250729-  dated July 29 2025.
